definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The method for determining the required number of bytes is simple.
sentences.chinese: 確定所需要字節數的方法很簡單。
寫入磁盤的字節數更少。

sentences.english: Therefore, the number of bytes required in multi-byte format depends upon the length value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在多字節格式中所需要的字節數取決於長度值。

sentences.english: Each tool option calculates a rough estimate of the bytes consumed.
sentences.chinese: 每個工具選項都粗略估算佔用的字節數。

sentences.english: The contents of these cells are translated into an expected number of bytes for the expected response values.
sentences.chinese: 這些單元的內容將被轉換爲預期響應值的預期字節數。

sentences.english: You specify the split criterion in the adapter as a number of bytes.
sentences.chinese: 拆分條件以字節數的形式在適配器中指定。

sentences.english: Number of bytes of user data to skip before starting the check data interleave .
sentences.chinese: 在開始檢查數據交替前，要忽略的用戶數據字節數。

sentences.english: This parameter accepts the values either in terms of a decimal percentage or a number of kilobytes.
sentences.chinese: 該參數接受百分比數或千字節數。
